jobInfo.postDescription:
IQC/QA(男女不限) 18-30岁之间
"   经验要求：有电子产品方面的QC方面经验，熟悉产品最基本的外观功能检验要求，工作勤劳，服从上级安排。
"   工作职责：及时完成来料检验，成品抽检，并完成工整的字面报表，我公司主要做简单的电脑音箱。
jobInfo.address: 深圳深圳市麦可森科技有限公司3-5楼

brandComInfo.introduce:
Built in 2008, Shenzhen Maikesen Technology Co.,Ltd. is specializing in the manufacture and development of computer parts, mainly produce all kinds of mini 2.0 speaker\2.1 speaker\Fabric bluetooth speaker\Waterproof bluetooth speaker\Outdoor bluetooth speaker . 

We have own R&D Team, 6 pcs moulding lines, 4 pcs production lines and QC&QA departments. Compared with other suppliers, we can provide the same products with competitive prices, or the same price with better quality. 

The best quality with the best price is always what we offer for our customers. Besides, the most important thing is our loyalty to clients, which makes us become one of the best OEM makers in Guangdong Province. We sincerely hope to cooperate with customers all over the world. 

Operation Idea: Try to achieve every dream and win your satisfaction and trust with high-quality service; try to perfect each manufacturing step; improve the competitiveness of products to assure the long-term development. 

Operation Principle: Produce high-quality high-precision sonic frameworks and satisfy customers' needs; provide fast and perfect service; shorten the time cycle for developing new products; lower the costs of developing new products for customers; give customer support at reasonable price. 

Operation Target: Quality is the aim, high-efficiency is the operation principle, and customer satisfaction is the target.
